tutorial.welcomeDescription: It looks like this is your first time. Would you like a quick tutorial?
tutorial.goalDescription: Your objective is simple: have the lowest score (the fewest crows) at the end of each round.
tutorial.handDescription: These are your four secret cards. You can't look at them freely, so memory is key!
tutorial.firstPeekDescription: At the start of a round, you get to peek at any two of your cards. Click two to reveal them, then press 'Finish Peeking'.
tutorial.pilesDescription: On your turn, draw a card from the face-down Draw Pile or the face-up Discard Pile.
tutorial.actionsDescription: After drawing, you can swap the card with one in your hand, discard it, or use its special action if it has one.
tutorial.pobudkaDescription: When you think your score is the lowest, press this on your turn instead of drawing a card to end the round. Be carefulâ€”if you're wrong, you get a penalty!
tutorial.readyDescription: That's all you need to know. Have fun, and may your dreams be free of crows!
